aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Your growth partner in the digital world
aboutPage.storyP1: MaxUp was founded with a simple mission: help businesses thrive in the digital age. What started as a small team of passionate developers and marketers has grown into a full-service digital agency serving clients across the Middle East and beyond.
aboutPage.storyP2: We believe that great digital experiences are built at the intersection of creativity and data. Every project we take on is driven by strategy, executed with precision, and measured by real results. Our team brings together diverse expertise in development, design, marketing, and content creation to deliver comprehensive solutions.

items.question: How long does a website project take?
items.answer: Typically 2-6 weeks depending on complexity. A simple one-page site takes about 2 weeks, while a full custom web application can take 4-6 weeks or more.

items.question: Do you offer payment plans?
items.answer: Yes! We offer flexible payment plans. Typically 50% upfront and 50% upon completion, but we can discuss arrangements that work for your budget.

items.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade your plan at any time. We'll credit what you've already paid toward the new plan and adjust the scope accordingly.

items.question: What's included in support?
items.answer: Our support includes bug fixes, minor content updates, security patches, and technical assistance. Response time is within 24 hours for standard plans and 4 hours for premium.

items.question: Do you work with businesses outside Israel?
items.answer: Yes, we serve clients across the Middle East and internationally. We work remotely and can accommodate different time zones and languages.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the results?
items.answer: We work closely with you throughout the project with regular check-ins and revisions. We offer up to 3 rounds of revisions to ensure you're completely happy with the final result.
